About

Holbemn is a therapist-in-training, thoroughly rooted in the Midwest. He writes weekly about his personal experiences in therapy, thoughts on mental health, and questions about life.

Please send your own bizarre questions, comments, or thoughts to me at holbemn(at)holbemn.xyz or on Twitter, @Holbemn. I must disclaim that I cannot dispense any clinical advice and that my writing here is reflective solely of my personal opinions and thoughts.

If you would like to learn more about Holbemn, check out my first post.

Follow Holbemn on the Twitter!

Invite Holbemn into your Atom/RSS Feed!
